name: Pearlcore Social Share
author: pearlcore

sections.description:
Sharing content

The plugin currently supports the following networks for sharing your content:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google+
  • Pinterest
  • Linkedin

This plugin boasts some impressive features, it allows you to display share counts with template option.

  • Select Sharing Type.
  • Select Page To Show
  • Choose Place To Show
sections.installation:
1. Upload pc-social-share.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go To Social Share setting page do changes and save.
  4. You are done.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Remove Fancy Network
  • Add Linkedin Network
  • Add Popup
  • Change Screenshots

1.0

  • initial release
